text: Glass Houses is the seventh studio album by Billy Joel and released on 12 March 1980 through Columbia Records. It went to number 1 in Canada, Iceland and the United States, number 2 in Australia and Norway, number 3 in Zimbabwe, number 4 in Austria, number 6 in New Zealand, Japan and Sweden and number 9 in the United Kingdom. It won a Grammy Award in 1981. ==Track listing== All songs written by Billy Joel. == References == Category:1980 albums Category:Billy Joel albums
title: Glass Houses (album)
